QuestData.Title: Staging Point
QuestData.Description: That is quite a corridor you and our allies have punched through the city. It will be difficult to hold but it will cut a wedge in Elisande's forces.$b$bOculeth has been busy redirecting a telemancy beacon to this location but wanted to give you the honor of activating it.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, hero. With this as our staging ground, our forces have a clear shot at the city gates.$b$bThalyssra has ordered her rebels to secure our location and cover our rear flank.$b$bOnce we have our siege vehicles in place we should be ready to assault the city.
